thread.title: Sruthi Hariharan is Arjun Sarja’s wife
thread.title_full: Sruthi Hariharan is Arjun Sarja’s wife - The Times of India

author: Prathibha Joy
title: Sruthi Hariharan is Arjun Sarja’s wife
text: Sruthi Hariharan has signed up for a Kannada-Tamil bilingual. To be directed by Arun Vaidyanathan, the as-yet-untitled crime thriller has Sruthi in the role of Arjun Sarja's wife. "I play a modern artist and mom, with a slightly older look. I am very kicked about it, as it is not something I have done before," says the actress. Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
